channel.title: Tree's list of the perfect formular
channel.description:
[b][u]rpg[/u][/b] WoW - Good for your daily role playing fix. Oblivion - Good when WoW servers are down and internet is offline. Fable (xbox) - When computer is fully out.
[b][u]fps[/u][/b] cs 1.6 - old school gaming. cs:source - eye candy. Battlefield (all) - Good massive fights. ET - Good game.
[b][u]rts[/u][/b] Age of mythology - eye candy. Age of empires - wiked. Warcraft2 - best game i'v ever played in my life. Wc3 - shit game but good online gameplay.
With these games on your pc, it'll mean heaps of fun even if your internet is down.

item.title: Tree's list of the perfect formular
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

Hex Key:

FEAR

Hey Hex, hit me up for a game k?

item.title: Tree's list of the perfect formular
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:9, topic:64186”][quote author=rabcarl link=topic=93023.msg996343#msg996343 date=1173585632]

[u]RTS
Shogun: Total War

I like the first medeival total war more
[/quote]

I’ve only played Shogun. Most people seem to like Rome a lot.[/quote]
Yes Rome is a lot of fun. I pretty much owned all of europe in it. The abttles are just so much fun. Zoom in close to your men with thousands just marching into battle, it’s pretty sweet.

Read full topic
